page.title: 02FROM THE TOP DECK
page.content: { From the top deck of the bus I saw Ty Gwyn Old Peoples Home, Fairwater Lesiure Centre/Comprehensive School and then saw Springvale Industrial Estate farther down the hill. We came to Thornhill which was all red brick including shops,school and even the Kingfisher Pub. There I noticed a post box. The Yew Tree area stop was where the most people got on the bus. Soon after that we reached the town centre. There were some odd flats there. We spotted Peterson's Funeral Home, the Fire Station and lots more things. The journey took one hour. Our route was Coed Eva_Fairwater Greenmeadow-Thornhill-Upper Cwmbran Pontnewydd-Town Centre and back.
